page.title: 11OTHER CLUBS:WOKINGHAM
page.content: {St. Sebastian's Memorial Hall.} This was built by Howard Palmer and family and is the responsibility of the Wokingham Without Parish Council. The rear portion is leased to the {Working Men's Club}which has a large membership. The hall area plus a small stage and kitchen is available for hire,toilets being shared with the Men's Club.The cost of hiring is Â£2.60 per hour weekdays,Â£4-Â£5 on Saturdays. A{playgroup}uses the premises every weekday morning,in the afternoon {dancing classes,Women's Institute and {Old Age Pensioner}functions.Weekday evening activities include{Scottish {Dancing,Ballroom Dancing,Wine Club, {Dog Training and Parish Council {meetings.}On Saturdays there are {wedding receptions,discos,parties, {sales,}in fact the hall is the centre for social gatherings in the area.
